p: The supercritical fluid extraction (SFE) was carried out using the same device mentioned above. About 40 g of root powder mixed with 70 g of glass beads were loaded into the extraction vessel. The process of extraction was performed under the following conditions: Constant temperature of 323 K, pressure of 20 MPa, flow rate of CO 2 operated at 60 mL/min, and a total extraction time of 90 min.
